overview:
Phuc Truong is Chief Technology Officer at UpDown, the leader in social networking for virtual investing. As CTO, he is responsible for leading the development of strategy, implementation and operations for the technology infrastructure of the company.

With over ten years of software and web development experience, Phuc has been at the front of internet technology from architecting and developing large and scalable systems to managing and building elite software teams. His passion is in developing innovative and cutting edge web destinations.

In 1997, while a student a Harvard University, Phuc co-founded Crimson Solutions Inc (eRecruiting.com). During that time, Phuc served as CTO and led the technology efforts in developing eRecruiting.com into the largest online recruiting destination for colleges and universities today. Crimson Solutions received over $22M of venture capital from Polaris Ventures and grew to over 100 employees. Crimson Solutions eventually become Experience.com and now serves over 3 million students and thousands of universities and is profitable.

In 2001, Phuc founded Zoomlane, a provider of software development and consultancy services. At Zoomlane he developed cutting edge web-base applications for real estate, insurance, CRM, and financial services.

Source: UpDown.com
